Title: Not Without My Daughter.
Subtitle: .
Authors: Betty Mahmoody;William Hoffer.
Categories: Americans.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=a-pQSxS3SBgC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: "An Iranian doctor living in America with his American wife Betty and their child Mahtob wants to see his homeland again. He convinces his wife to take a short holiday there with him and Mahtob. Betty is reluctant, as Iran is not a pleasant place, especially if you are American and female. Upon arrival in Iran, it appears that her worst fears are realized: Moody declares that they will be living there from now on. Betty is determined to escape from Iran, but taking her daughter with her presents a larger problem.".
